get.description: List the operations for the provider
Lists all the addresses available under the subscription.

post.description: This method provides the list of configurations for the given product family, product line and product under subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: $skipToken is supported on list of configurations, which provides the next page in the list of configurations.

parameters.name: configurationsRequest
parameters.description: Filters for showing the configurations.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

post.description: This method provides the list of product families for the given subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: $expand is supported on configurations parameter for product, which provides details on the configurations for the product.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: $skipToken is supported on list of product families, which provides the next page in the list of product families.

parameters.name: productFamiliesRequest
parameters.description: Filters for showing the product families.

get.description: Lists all the addresses available under the given resource group.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: $filter is supported to filter based on shipping address properties. Filter supports only equals operation.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: $skipToken is supported on Get list of addresses, which provides the next page in the list of address.

get.description: Gets information about the specified address.

parameters.name: addressName
parameters.description: The name of the address Resource within the specified resource group. address names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use any alphanumeric and underscore only

put.description: Creates a new address with the specified parameters. Existing address can be updated with this API

get.description: Lists order item at resource group level.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: $filter is supported to filter based on order id. Filter supports only equals operation.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: $expand is supported on device details, forward shipping details and reverse shipping details parameters. Each of these can be provided as a comma separated list. Device Details for order item provides details on the devices of the product, Forward and Reverse Shipping details provide forward and reverse shipping details respectively.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: $skipToken is supported on Get list of order items, which provides the next page in the list of order items.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: $expand is supported on device details, forward shipping details and reverse shipping details parameters. Each of these can be provided as a comma separated list. Device Details for order item provides details on the devices of the product, Forward and Reverse Shipping details provide forward and reverse shipping details respectively.

get.description: Lists order at resource group level.
